description: Recommended MCP servers for BrainDrive development

playwright.description: Browser automation for visual testing and UI verification
playwright.notes: Enables Claude to see and interact with the frontend during development

sqlite.description: Direct database access for BrainDrive's SQLite database
sqlite.notes: Allows Claude to query and inspect database state during development

github.description: GitHub integration for issues, PRs, and repo management

filesystem.description: Enhanced file operations (usually not needed - Claude Code has built-in file tools)

installation_notes: 1. Copy the servers you want to use to your Claude Code config
2. Replace placeholders (like YOUR_GITHUB_TOKEN) with actual values
3. Adjust paths as needed for your project structure
4. Run 'claude mcp list' to verify servers are connected
recommended_for_braindrive: playwright - Essential for visual verification of UI changes
sqlite - Useful for inspecting database during development
github - Required for issue-based development workflow
